name: Uncle-stuffy
body: ![stuffy](http://tinypic.com?ref=fe4gux)Welcome to the weird and wonderful world of Uncle Stuffy. Uncle Stuffy is animated and ready to get weird with all of your friends and family. Want to break the ice by asking an acquaintance to hold you? That's what uncles are for!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
